text: Alirajpur railway station (station code: ARPR) is the main station in the Indian city of Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh, India. It is opened in 2019. ==Trains== * 59121/59122 Pratapnagar - Alirajpur Passenger. ==See also== * Chhota Udaipur railway station * Bodeli railway station * Pratapnagar railway station * Vadodara railway station Category:Railway stations in Madhya Pradesh
title: Alirajpur railway station
